function.name: run_datagen
function.description: Generate the data required for the tasks.

function.name: format_markdown
function.description: Formats a markdown file inplace using the user specified prettier version.

input_file.description: The path to the input file containing the markdown content.

prettier_version.description: The version of prettier to use for formatting the markdown content.

function.name: sort_contacts
function.description: Reads a list of contacts from input_file and sorts the contacts by last name and then firstname and saves it to a output_file.

input_file.description: The path to the input file containing the list of contacts.

output_file.description: The path to the output file where the sorted list of contacts will be saved.

function.name: write_recent_log_lines
function.description: Writes the first line of n most recent log files to the output file.

log_dir.description: The path to the directory containing the log files.

output_file.description: The path to the output file where the first line of n most recent log files will be saved.

count.description: The number of most recent log files to read.

function.name: generate_markdown_index
function.description: Generate the markdown index file for the given directory containing markdown files.

docs_dir.description: The path to the directory containing the markdown files.

index_file.description: The path to the output file where the markdown index will be saved.

function.name: extract_sender_email
function.description: Extract sender email from the email text.

input_file.description: The path to the input file containing the email text.

output_file.description: The path to the output file where the extracted sender email will be saved.

function.name: extract_credit_card_number
function.description: Extract credit card number from the image.

image_path.description: The path to the image file containing the credit card number.

output_file.description: The path to the output file where the extracted credit card number will be saved.

function.name: find_most_similar_comments
function.description: Find similar comments in the given text file.

input_file.description: The path to the input file containing the comments.

output_file.description: The path to the output file where the similar comments will be saved.
